question: if i travel to a farm 100miles away and i miss my salat wen i return home how much qaza rakats do i have to pray ?
answer:
QUESTION
For Q1, please also list the Du?aas. Please provide the translation and transliteration of all the Du?aa(s).
ANSWER


Share:
1. Before setting out on a journey, perform two Rakaats of Salaat-us-safar.
Thereafter, make Du'aa for safety and Aafiyat and for a safe return. Also,
recite Aayaatul Kursi repeatedly especially after every Fardh Salaat.
2. The best Du'aa you may recite is, 'Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan
wa fil aakhirat hasanatan wa qinaa adhaaban-naar.' (O Allah Grant us
goodness in this world as well as the hereafter and protect us from the
fire).
Another Du'aa is, 'Allaahumma inniy as-alukal afwa wa aafiya' (O Allah! I
seek your protection, safety and forgiveness)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
